nodes.name: transferFunds
addFunds
burnFunds
transferFunds
addFunds
burnFunds

addAuthorized(address).details: Add user to authorized users. Can only be called by another authorized user.

addFunds(address,uint256).details: Allows authorized addresses to mint funds to a user's account, simulating an equivalent deposit with Disberse

params.recipient: The address to mint funds to

burnFunds(address,uint256).details: Allows authorized addresses to burn funds from a user's account, simulating an equivalent withdrawal with Disberse

params.holder: Address to burn the funds from

removeAuthorized(address).details: Remove user's authorization. Can only be called by the same user or another authorized user

transferFunds(address,uint256).details: Allows user to transfer funds to another address
transferFunds(address,uint256).return: boolean indicating success of the transfer
